messages.message: Has anyone noticed that on the new macs only space is treated as a word delimiter? When I try to move forward/backward by word, it treats path/to/some/folder as one word instead of moving ahead by path, to, some, folder individually. Any way to change this to include / and . as word delimiters?
ah apparently this is a zsh thing

ah a fix! you can add this to your `.zshrc` to get back the bash behavior:
```autoload -U select-word-style
select-word-style bash```
